article_html: This week, telly addict Andrew Collins goes back to the cold war for BBC spy drama The Game; asks if Madam Secretary on Sky Living is the "women's West Wing"; finds music-biz saga Empire on E4 a bit too Dallas; hops aboard for Peter Kay's Car Share on BBC1; and endures the last Leaders Debate on Question Time and spots the Don Draper influence on Ed Miliband
text: This week, telly addict Andrew Collins goes back to the cold war for BBC spy drama The Game; asks if Madam Secretary on Sky Living is the "women's West Wing"; finds music-biz saga Empire on E4 a bit too Dallas; hops aboard for Peter Kay's Car Share on BBC1; and endures the last Leaders Debate on Question Time and spots the Don Draper influence on Ed Miliband
title: The Game,Madam Secretary,Empire and more: TV review - video
